title: BUG: Add Validation to Feedback Message Field
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### What went down?

Implement validation for the feedback message field to ensure users enter at least 5 characters, disallowing single-character inputs. 

### Record

- [X] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct
- [X] I'm a gssoc-24-ext contributor
- [X] I have starred the repository
- [X] I want to work on this issue
- [X] I check the issue doesn't exist
author: ananyag309
